Mark is very engaged in the technology community and regularly tweets and blogs. He also speaks about the future of technology and the industry at technology conferences across the North America.

His team also worked to enhance the ecosystem of independent software vendors in Canada, including working with startups and the venture capital community. Mark has held several other positions at Microsoft Canada including as the Group Manager of the Developer Evangelism Team and the Manager of the Network Service Provider Solutions Team. Prior to that Mark was a Business Development Manager working with Canadian technology startups and venture capital firms. Mark originally joined Microsoft as a Technology Specialist. Before joining Microsoft in May 1998, Mark was a Systems Engineer at Digital Equipment specializing in development of Microsoft solutions.
